properties.description: This pipeline will copy data from blob to target SQL DB dynamically into multiple target tables changing parameter value dynamically

sqlReaderQuery.value: select TableName from dbo.RefLookupSQLDWTableMig where LoadType='Copy'

preCopyScript.value: IF OBJECT_ID ('[@{item().TableName}]','U') is not null DROP TABLE [@{item().TableName}];

properties.description: Real scenario migration from on-premise database to Azure SQL DB
Migrate Dimensions from on-premise database to ADLS

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('select * from FactInternetSales where cast(SUBSTRING(cast(OrderDateKey as varchar),1, 6) as int) =', variables('month_key'))
@concat('select * from FactInternetSales where cast(SUBSTRING(cast(OrderDateKey as varchar),1, 6) as int) =', variables('MONTH_KEY'))

preCopyScript.value: @{concat('DELETE FROM FactInternetSales where cast(SUBSTRING(cast(OrderDateKey as varchar),1, 6) as int) =', variables('MONTH_KEY'))}

properties.description: Writing multiple source files to target tables
This is an event based trigger
